title: Bug 115960Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When datetime values retrieved from a table are displayed in a dynamic text item and a data/text item, they appear in different formats.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR: Steps to reproduce:1. Retrieve datetime values from a table.2. Display the datetime values in a dynamic text item.3. Display the datetime values in a data/text item.4. Compare the formats of datetime values displayed in both items to check if they are different.
